meanings.definition: An antiretroviral drug used to treat HIV/AIDS.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed zidovudine to help manage the patient's HIV.
meanings.sent2: People with HIV often take zidovudine as part of their treatment.
meanings.sent3: The bottle of zidovudine pills danced on the shelf, ready to fight the virus.
meanings.sent4: Zidovudine acted like a brave soldier, battling the HIV in the body.
meanings.sent5: The red color of the zidovudine pills symbolized hope for those with HIV.

meanings.definition: To treat HIV/AIDS with the drug zidovudine.
meanings.sent1: Doctors zidovudine patients to help them fight the virus.
meanings.sent2: She zidovudines her HIV with the prescribed medication.
meanings.sent3: The nurse playfully zidovudined the patient, pretending to administer the drug.
meanings.sent4: He zidovudines his illness with determination and a positive attitude.
meanings.sent5: The medical team zidovudines every patient with care and expertise.
